description: From French litigant, from Middle French, from Latin litigans, litigantis.

adjectives.description: litigant (comparative more litigant, superlative most litigant)

entries.meaning: Disposed to litigate; contending in law; engaged in a lawsuit.
(law) A party suing or being sued in a lawsuit, or otherwise calling upon the judicial process to determine the outcome of a suit.
